about_the_game:
Welcome to Thorgard, the last bastion against the dark forces threatening the Nordic realms. Your task is to defend your sacred mead hall and safeguard the precious mead within its walls. Immerse yourself in a minimalist rogue-lite base-defense adventure. Fast-paced action and simple gameplay guide you through a world full of dangers and challenges. Face hordes of hostile creatures and upgrade your defenses. Valhalla calls for a hero – are you ready to take on this mighty task and fulfill your destiny?


Base Building

Defend your base by day, gathering resources and constructing buildings to boost your economy and fortify defenses. But at night, enemies come wanting your special mead and try to break in. You'll need to strategize carefully, deciding whether to prioritize bolstering your economy or strengthening your defenses to withstand the impending onslaught. Each choice shapes your path and determines your chances of survival in the unforgiving world of Thorgard.


Battle

You have different ways to defend your base. You can construct defense towers for automatic attacks and barracks to train troops. Additionally, you can join the fight personally, utilizing powerful melee attacks. As you progress, you'll unlock ultimate abilities bestowed by the gods, further enhancing your arsenal and turning the tide of battle in your favor.


Strategy

Upgrade buildings and player with skill trees to enhance power in Thorgard's defense. Strengthen structures, unlock new abilities, and improve player stats for better defense against escalating enemy threats. Customize your strategy and fortify your stronghold for ultimate victory in this Viking-themed base defense adventure.
